<<<<<<< HEAD
The true chronicle historie of the whole life and death of Thomas Lord Cromwell As it hath beene sundrie times publikely acted by the right honorable the Lord Chamberlaine his seruants. Written by W.S. W. S. Shakespeare, William, 1564-1616, attrib. author. aut Smith, Wentworth, fl. 1601-1623, attrib. author. aut
[52+] p.
[By R. Read] for William Iones, and are to be solde at his house neere Holburne conduict, at the signe of the Gunne, Imprinted at London : 1602.
Attributed to Wentworth Smith and (on slight grounds) to William Shakespeare.--Folger Shakespeare Library Catalogue. Printer's name from STC. Signatures: A-F⁴ G¹+. Imperfect; Slight print show-through; all after G1 lacking. Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
=======
